Content.Text:
<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Da da-da doooooo!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I...I bit my tongue.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Erm...I-I was just practicing my entrance
fanfare. I'm testing lots of them out to see which
I like best.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, an offering. Thank you! Um...

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>Oh my! A <BLUE>Mushroom Pie</BLUE>!
<PAGE>
<BLUE>Mushroom Pie</BLUE> is possibly the bestest food
humans ever cooked up! Yay!
<PAGE>
Can't wait to dig in later. Thank you so much,
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oooh! I really like these.
<PAGE>
You're a super mega-nice human, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
Thank you!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ooh, I like these!
<PAGE>
You're a real caring heart, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Thank you!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, er...<MYNAME>, you gave this to me by
accident, right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I know you're not the sort of human who would
give something like this to me on purpose.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
O-oh...*sniffle*...*sniffle*...you're such a
meanie, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>I don't like these at all! If you give me another
one, I'll tell Witchie about it!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Wha? WAAAH! You horrible meanie-pants!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>I haaaaate <BLUE>Soybean Salad</BLUE>! It's yucky and gross
and tastes like cardboard and I don't ever want
to eat it!
<PAGE>
Why would you treat me so bad, <MYNAME>?
I...I thought we were friends...

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well, I'll be floating along home, then. Bye-bye,
<MYNAME>!
